```{=html}
<div id="gdp-comparison-slide" style="width: 100%; height: 420px;"></div>
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Wait for Reveal.js to be ready and the slide to be visible
  function initGdpChart() {
    var chartDom = document.getElementById('gdp-comparison-slide');
    if (!chartDom || chartDom.offsetWidth === 0) {
      setTimeout(initGdpChart, 200);
      return;
    }
    var chart = echarts.init(chartDom);

    var countries = ['Bulgaria', 'Japan', 'UK', 'OECD Avg', 'Canada', 'South Korea', 'Australia', 'USA'];
    var values = [36574, 47484, 54232, 55122, 56856, 57070, 62730, 78179];
    var colors = countries.map(function(c) {
      return c === 'Bulgaria' ? '#E53E3E' : (c === 'OECD Avg' ? '#718096' : '#3182CE');
    });

    chart.setOption({
      animation: true,
      animationDuration: 1500,
      animationEasing: 'cubicOut',
      tooltip: {
        trigger: 'axis',
        axisPointer: { type: 'shadow' },
        formatter: function(params) {
          return '<strong>' + params[0].name + '</strong><br/>GDP per capita: <strong>$' + params[0].value.toLocaleString() + '</strong>';
        }
      },
      grid: { left: '3%', right: '12%', bottom: '3%', top: '3%', containLabel: true },
      xAxis: {
        type: 'value',
        axisLabel: { formatter: function(v) { return '$' + (v/1000).toFixed(0) + 'K'; } }
      },
      yAxis: {
        type: 'category',
        data: countries,
        axisLabel: { fontSize: 13 }
      },
      series: [{
        type: 'bar',
        data: values.map(function(v, i) {
          return { value: v, itemStyle: { color: colors[i], borderRadius: [0, 4, 4, 0] } };
        }),
        barWidth: '60%',
        label: {
          show: true,
          position: 'right',
          formatter: function(p) { return '$' + p.value.toLocaleString(); },
          fontSize: 12,
          color: '#4a5568'
        }
      }]
    });

    window.addEventListener('resize', function() { chart.resize(); });
    if (typeof Reveal !== 'undefined') {
      Reveal.on('slidechanged', function() { setTimeout(function() { chart.resize(); }, 100); });
    }
  }
  initGdpChart();
});
</script>
```

```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
```

## –ú–æ–¥—É–ª 3: SDI-EU ‚Äî Sector Development Index {background-color="#f7fafc"}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="35%"}
::: {.fragment .fade-right}
**–ê–≤—Ç–æ—Ä—Å–∫–∞ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–æ–ª–æ–≥–∏—è** –∑–∞ –∏–∑–º–µ—Ä–≤–∞–Ω–µ –Ω–∞ —Å–µ–∫—Ç–æ—Ä–Ω–æ—Ç–æ —Å–±–ª–∏–∂–∞–≤–∞–Ω–µ:

$$SDI = \sqrt[3]{LP \times Comp \times Inv}$$

**–¢—Ä–∏ —Å—Ç—ä–ª–±–∞** (EU27 = 100):

- **LP** ‚Äî Labour Productivity (–ë–î–° / –∑–∞–µ—Ç–æ—Å—Ç)
- **Comp** ‚Äî Compensation per Employee
- **Inv** ‚Äî Investment Intensity (GFCF / –ë–î–°)

–¶–≤–µ—Ç–æ–≤–æ –∫–æ–¥–∏—Ä–∞–Ω–µ –ø–æ —Å—Ç–µ–ø–µ–Ω –Ω–∞ –∫–æ–Ω–≤–µ—Ä–≥–µ–Ω—Ü–∏—è
:::

```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  function initSdiChart() {
    var chartDom = document.getElementById('sdi-slide-chart');
    if (!chartDom || chartDom.offsetWidth === 0) {
      setTimeout(initSdiChart, 200);
      return;
    }
    var chart = echarts.init(chartDom);

    function sdiColor(value) {
      if (value < 80) return '#E53E3E';
      if (value < 95) return '#ED8936';
      if (value < 105) return '#48BB78';
      if (value < 120) return '#3182CE';
      return '#1A365D';
    }

    var sectors = ['Real Estate', 'Finance', 'Agriculture', 'Industry', 'Professional Svcs', 'Trade & Transport', 'Arts & Other', 'ICT', 'Public Admin', 'Construction'];
    var sdiValues = [31.1, 34.6, 36.8, 41.9, 49.6, 49.6, 52.1, 56.1, 59.1, 84.8];

    chart.setOption({
      animation: true,
      animationDuration: 1500,
      animationEasing: 'elasticOut',
      tooltip: {
        trigger: 'axis',
        axisPointer: { type: 'shadow' },
        formatter: function(params) {
          var p = params[0];
          var band = p.value < 80 ? '–ó–Ω–∞—á–∏—Ç–µ–ª–Ω–æ –ø–æ–¥ –ï–°' : (p.value < 95 ? '–ü–æ–¥ –ï–°' : (p.value < 105 ? '–ù–∞ –Ω–∏–≤–æ –ï–°' : (p.value < 120 ? '–ù–∞–¥ –ï–°' : '–ó–Ω–∞—á–∏—Ç–µ–ª–Ω–æ –Ω–∞–¥ –ï–°')));
          return '<strong>' + p.name + '</strong><br/>SDI: <strong>' + p.value + '</strong><br/><span style="color:' + sdiColor(p.value) + '">' + band + '</span>';
        }
      },
      grid: { left: '3%', right: '12%', bottom: '3%', top: '3%', containLabel: true },
      xAxis: {
        type: 'value',
        name: 'SDI Score',
        max: 110
      },
      yAxis: {
        type: 'category',
        data: sectors,
        axisLabel: { fontSize: 12 }
      },
      series: [{
        type: 'bar',
        data: sdiValues.map(function(v) {
          return { value: v, itemStyle: { color: sdiColor(v), borderRadius: [0, 4, 4, 0] } };
        }),
        barWidth: '65%',
        label: {
          show: true,
          position: 'right',
          formatter: function(p) { return p.value.toFixed(1); },
          fontSize: 12,
          color: '#4a5568'
        },
        markLine: {
          silent: true,
          symbol: 'none',
          lineStyle: { type: 'dashed', color: '#A0AEC0', width: 2 },
          label: { formatter: 'EU27 = 100', position: 'end', color: '#718096', fontSize: 11 },
          data: [{ xAxis: 100 }]
        }
      }]
    });

    window.addEventListener('resize', function() { chart.resize(); });
    if (typeof Reveal !== 'undefined') {
      Reveal.on('slidechanged', function() { setTimeout(function() { chart.resize(); }, 100); });
    }
  }
  initSdiChart();
});
</script>
```

```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  function initSdiTrend() {
    var chartDom = document.getElementById('sdi-trend-slide-chart');
    if (!chartDom || chartDom.offsetWidth === 0) {

    }
    var chart = echarts.init(chartDom);

    var years = ['2016', '2017', '2018', '2019', '2020', '2021', '2022', '2023'];

      'Trade & Transport':[41.2, 40.2, 42.9, 41.6, 49.9, 44.3, 46.6, 49.6],
      'Professional Svcs':[36.9, 41.7, 40.4, 40.2, 41.6, 42.6, 48.1, 49.6],
      'Industry':         [35.0, 35.0, 34.5, 34.3, 35.1, 36.0, 38.7, 41.9],
      'Agriculture':      [28.4, 29.1, 30.8, 30.5, 29.8, 31.6, 36.3, 36.8],
      'Finance':          [30.4, 33.3, 34.1, 33.6, 40.0, 35.3, 39.0, 34.6],
      'Real Estate':      [19.9, 29.0, 30.8, 28.3, 27.8, 28.2, 29.8, 31.1]
    };

    var colors = {
      'Construction': '#D69E2E',
      'Public Admin': '#2B6CB0',
      'ICT': '#319795',
      'Arts & Other': '#975A16',

      'Professional Svcs': '#D53F8C',
      'Industry': '#DD6B20',
      'Agriculture': '#E53E3E',
      'Finance': '#805AD5',
      'Real Estate': '#9F7AEA'
    };

    var series = Object.keys(sectorData).map(function(name) {
      return {
        name: name,
        type: 'line',
        data: sectorData[name],
        smooth: true,
        lineStyle: { width: name === 'Construction' ? 4 : 2 },
        symbolSize: name === 'Construction' ? 8 : 4,
        itemStyle: { color: colors[name] },
        emphasis: { focus: 'series' }
      };
    });

    // EU = 100 reference line
    series.push({
      name: 'EU27 = 100',
      type: 'line',

    chart.setOption({

      animationDuration: 2000,

        trigger: 'axis',
        formatter: function(params) {
          var tip = '<strong>' + params[0].axisValue + '</strong><br/>';
          params.sort(function(a, b) { return (b.value || 0) - (a.value || 0); });
          params.forEach(function(p) {
            if (p.value !== null && p.seriesName !== 'EU27 = 100') {
              tip += p.marker + ' ' + p.seriesName + ': <strong>' + p.value.toFixed(1) + '</strong><br/>';
            }
          });
          return tip;
        }
      },
      legend: { data: Object.keys(sectorData).concat(['EU27 = 100']), bottom: 0, type: 'scroll', textStyle: { fontSize: 11 } },
      grid: { left: '3%', right: '4%', bottom: '14%', top: '5%', containLabel: true },
      xAxis: { type: 'category', data: years },
      yAxis: {
        type: 'value',
        name: 'SDI Score',
        nameLocation: 'middle',
        nameGap: 45
      },
      series: series
    });

    window.addEventListener('resize', function() { chart.resize(); });
    if (typeof Reveal !== 'undefined') {
      Reveal.on('slidechanged', function() { setTimeout(function() { chart.resize(); }, 100); });
    }
  }
  initSdiTrend();
});
</script>
```
